About.title: About me
About.subtitle: Full Stack Software Developer
About.paragraphOne: Full Stack Software Developer with over 5 years of experience, graduated in Information Systems from Universidade Santa Cec√≠lia. Passionate about technology and solving complex problems, I focus on efficiency, innovation, and quality in every delivery.
About.paragraphTwo: Throughout my career, I have led and collaborated on cross-functional projects, optimizing critical processes and ensuring robust and scalable solutions. I have a strong ability to understand business rules and turn technical challenges into continuous improvement opportunities.
About.paragraphThree: I am always looking for new challenges involving emerging technologies, system architecture, and high performance, actively contributing to the growth of products and teams.
